name: Datascape Dragon - Longlong
text:
2+ Level 3 monsters with the same Type and Attribute
While this card has material, your opponent cannot target it with card effects. When your opponent activates the effect of a monster with an Attribute that is not on their field, while they control a face-up monster (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "Datascape Dragon - Longlong" once per turn.
